string.name: manuallyReviewAdmissionRequests
string.comment:
manuallyReviewAdmissionRequests
A checkbox. If checked, players will need to write a request to join the team, which the user can decline or accept.

resources.string: If checked, players will need to write a request to join the team, which you can decline or accept.
Kick someone out of the team
Who do you want to kick out of the team?
Your join request will be reviewed by a team leader.
Your join request is being reviewed by a team leader.
A battle of multiple teams, each player scores points for their team
An Arena tournament that only members of your team can join
Send a private message to every member of the team
Send a private message to ALL members of the team. You can use this to call players to join a tournament or a team battle. Players who don\'t like receiving your messages might leave the team.
You may want to link one of these upcoming tournaments?
Users who can manage this team
(Optional) A password that new members must know to join this team.
